INVALID_OPTIONS: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK Options should be of type object
INVALID_SDK_KEY_IN_OPTIONS: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK Please provide the sdkKey in the options and should be a of type string
INVALID_ACCOUNT_ID_IN_OPTIONS: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK Please provide VWO account ID in the options and should be a of type string|number
INVALID_GATEWAY_SERVICE_WHEN_ALIASING_EN: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK Please provide a valid gateway service url in the options when aliasing is enabled
INVALID_POLLING_CONFIGURATION: Invalid {key} passed in options. Should be of type: {correctType} and greater than equal to 1000
ERROR_FETCHING_SETTINGS: Settings could not be fetched for account ID: {accountId} and SDK key: {sdkKey}. Error: {err}
INVALID_SETTINGS_SCHEMA: Settings are not valid for account ID: {accountId} and SDK key: {sdkKey}. Got settings as {settings} and errors: {errors}
UPDATING_CLIENT_INSTANCE_FAILED_WHEN_WEB: Failed to fetch settings and hence VWO client instance couldn't be updated when API: {apiName} got called having isViaWebhook param as {isViaWebhook}. Error: {err}
ERROR_UPDATING_SETTINGS: Error while updating settings. Error: {err}, originalSettings: {originalSettings}, latestSettings: {latestSettings}
INVALID_PARAM: {key} passed to {apiName} API is not of valid type. Got type: {type}, should be: {correctType}
FEATURE_NOT_FOUND: Feature not found for the key {featureKey}
EVENT_NOT_FOUND: Event {eventName} not found in any of the features metrics
ERROR_READING_DATA_FROM_STORAGE: Error while reading data from storage. Error: {err}
ERROR_PARSING_STORED_DATA: Error in parsing stored data. Error: {err}
INVALID_GATEWAY_URL: Please provide a valid URL for VWO Gateway Service
SDK_INIT_EVENT_FAILED: Error while sending SDK init event. Error: {err}
NETWORK_CALL_EXCEPTION: Network call for {extraData} with account ID: {accountId}. Error: {err}
ERROR_SETTING_SEGMENTATION_CONTEXT: Error in setting contextual data for segmentation. Got error: {err}
ERROR_VALIDATING_SEGMENTATION: Error in validating segmentation. Got error: {err}
USER_AGENT_VALIDATION_ERROR: Failed to validate user agent. Error: {err}
INVALID_IP_ADDRESS_IN_CONTEXT_FOR_PRE_SE: ipAddress is required in context to evaluate location pre-segmentation
INVALID_USER_AGENT_IN_CONTEXT_FOR_PRE_SE: userAgent is required in context to evaluate user-agent pre-segmentation
ERROR_FETCHING_DATA_FROM_GATEWAY: Error while fetching data from gateway. Error: {err}
ERROR_SENDING_DATA_TO_GATEWAY: Error while sending data to gateway. Error: {err}
ATTRIBUTES_MAP_ERROR: Attributes map must contain atleast 1 key-value pair
ATTRIBUTES_MAP_INVALID: Attributes should be an object containing key-value pairs
VALUES_MISMATCH_BATCHING_NOT_ENABLED: Values mismatch from the expectation of both parameters. Batching not initialized.
INVALID_EVENTS_PER_REQUEST_VALUE: Events_per_request values is invalid (should be greater than 0 and less than 5000). Using default value of events_per_request parameter : 100
INVALID_REQUEST_TIME_INTERVAL_VALUE: Request_time_interval values is invalid (should be greater than 0). Using default value of request_time_interval parameter : 600
BATCHING_NOT_ENABLED: Batching is not enabled. Pass batchEventData in the SDK configuration while invoking init API.
ERROR_CHECKING_FEATURE_IN_USER_STORAGE: Error while checking feature in user storage. Got error: {err}
ERROR_FINDING_WINNER_CAMPAIGN: Error while finding winner campaign inside {method}. Error: {err}
ERROR_EVALUATING_RULE: Error occurred while evaluating rule. Error: {err}
BATCH_FLUSH_FAILED: Failed to send batch events. Re-enqueuing events for retry.
ERROR_PARSING_GATEWAY_URL: Error occurred while parsing gateway service URL: {err}
ERROR_SETTING_ALIAS: Alias failed to set on gateway service for user ID: {userId}.
ERROR_GETTING_ALIAS: Error while getting alias from gateway service for user ID: {userId}. Error: {err}
